name: Design System Basics
description:
Build your basic page structure based on the atomic design system. Compile your components with the draft page.


Atomic design pages to be created with the plugin;


Design System [Welcome]


Foundations [Title]

  • Colors
  • Typography
  • Icons
  • Rules


Component [Title]

  • Buttons
  • Navigations
  • Cards
  • Menus
  • Data Table
  • Date Pickers
  • Lists
  • Text Fields
  • Selection Controls
  • Sliders
  • Sheets: Bottom
  • Tabs
  • Snackbars
  • Dialogs
  • Tooltips
  • Alerts
  • Other


Modules [Title]

  • Header
  • Footer


Pages [Title]

  • Web Site
  • Application
  • Draft


There is also an Frame design where you can edit your variant and components thanks to the plugin.
